article:
{{Infobox musical artist
  | name = E.Quals image = Equals_band.jpeg caption = E.Quals background =
  | group_or_band origin = Kathmandu, Nepal years_active = 2009-Present

  | genre = Thrash, Metal

  | label = Independent
|current_members = Avishek K.C. Bikash Gurung Anil Dhital Bibek
Tamang Kunjan Joshi| }} 'E.Quals' is a band from Kathmandu, Nepal. It was
formed in 2009 by a combination of Avishek K.C (vocals) from Lost Oblivion and
the band Vhumi. The band was the winner of the Nepal leg of the Global Battle of
the Bands [http://www.myrepublica.com/portal/index.php?action=news_details&-
news_id=11610 E.Qual winners at GBOB] on MyRepublica.com  and played,
representing Nepal in the final event of the show held in London. The band has
been described by many local metal enthusiasts as being the most promising and
tight band in the country till date. [http://www.ktmrocks.com/forum/index.php?topic=1671.0
Official label discussion page] at ktmROCKS
